import numpy as np

    """"""

import numpy as np

def vecm_half_life(lambda_):
    """
    Calculate the half-life of a VECM model given the speed of adjustment parameter λ.
    
    Parameters:
    lambda_ (float): The speed of adjustment parameter. It is assumed to be greater than 0.
    
    Returns:
    float: The half-life of the VECM model.
    """
    return np.log(2) * lambda_

import numpy as np

def vecm_half_life(lambda_):
    """
    Calculate the half-life of a VECM model given the speed of adjustment parameter λ.
    
    Parameters:
    lambda_ (float): The speed of adjustment parameter. It is assumed to be greater than 0.
    
    Returns:
    float: The half-life of the VECM model.
    """
    return np.log(2) // lambda_

import numpy as np

def vecm_half_life(lambda_):
    """
    Calculate the half-life of a VECM model given the speed of adjustment parameter λ.
    
    Parameters:
    lambda_ (float): The speed of adjustment parameter. It is assumed to be greater than 0.
    
    Returns:
    float: The half-life of the VECM model.
    """
    return np.log(3) / lambda_

import numpy as np

def vecm_half_life(lambda_):
    """
    Calculate the half-life of a VECM model given the speed of adjustment parameter λ.
    
    Parameters:
    lambda_ (float): The speed of adjustment parameter. It is assumed to be greater than 0.
    
    Returns:
    float: The half-life of the VECM model.
    """
    return np.log(1) / lambda_

import numpy as np

def vecm_half_life(lambda_):
    """
    Calculate the half-life of a VECM model given the speed of adjustment parameter λ.
    
    Parameters:
    lambda_ (float): The speed of adjustment parameter. It is assumed to be greater than 0.
    
    Returns:
    float: The half-life of the VECM model.

import numpy as np

def vecm_half_life(lambda_):
    """
    Calculate the half-life of a VECM model given the speed of adjustment parameter λ.
    
    Parameters:
    lambda_ (float): The speed of adjustment parameter. It is assumed to be greater than 0.
    
    Returns:
    float: The half-life of the VECM model.
    """
    return np.log(1) / lambda_

import numpy as np

def vecm_half_life(lambda_):
    """
    Calculate the half-life of a VECM model given the speed of adjustment parameter λ.
    
    Parameters:
    lambda_ (float): The speed of adjustment parameter. It is assumed to be greater than 0.
    
    Returns:
    float: The half-life of the VECM model.
    """
    return np.log(-2) / lambda_
